controllers

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Controller
      • controllers.Application
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.classloading.enhancers.ControllersEnhancer.ControllerSupport, play.classloading.enhancers.LocalvariablesNamesEnhancer.LocalVariablesSupport

    public class Application
extends play.mvc.Controller
    Author:
    Ivana Frankic

    Main controller for this application
    Accepts HTTP requests and form submits from javascript/html
    Requests are routed based on rules in conf/routes
